**Reasoning:**

- For Interest20240102002, according to the invoice ("On January 02, 2024, an invoice was issued for a Interest Receivables, totaling $375.58. The receive_method of this transaction was interest receviable, and this transaction was unpaid."), the amount should be 375.58, status Unpaid.
- In the table, the amount was recorded as 438.32 and the status as Paid, both incorrect.
- All other fields for this record are either blank or match.
- No other entry in the sample has a conflicting value against its own invoice text for core fields (amount, payment/receipt status, etc), so only this transaction is reported.
